weka.gui

Class GenericArrayEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.gui.GenericArrayEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyEditor, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GenericArrayEditor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyEditor
    A PropertyEditor for arrays of objects that themselves have property editors.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7917 $
    Author:
    Len Trigg (trigg@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
